features: Buildable and poseable Pokemon building set including 4 figures
Set includes Pikachu, Squirtle, Charmander and Bulbasaur plus buildable environment stands
130 bricks and pieces combine with all MEGA Construx building sets and are compatible with other name brands
Ideal for ages 6 and up, this building toy provides build-and-play experiences to help develop creativity and problem-solving skills
body.description: Build the power that's inside with 4 buildable Pokémon, including Pikachu, Squirtle, Charmander and Bulbasaur, plus buildable environment stands which represent each figure's type and special power. The environments can then be connected in several different configurations. Wonder Builders building toys are designed for ages 6 and up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Wonder Builders Pokémon Set: Unleashing Creativity and Building Fun!"
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Wonder Builders Pokémon Set, and it has exceeded all my expectations! This delightful building toy offers an engaging and creative experience for both Pokémon enthusiasts and budding builders alike.The set includes four iconic Pokémon characters – Pikachu, Squirtle, Charmander, and Bulbasaur – each brought to life with vibrant and well-designed building blocks. The attention to detail in capturing the essence of these beloved creatures is commendable, making the building process not only enjoyable but also rewarding.One standout feature is the inclusion of buildable environment stands that represent each Pokémon's type and special power. This adds an extra layer of excitement and allows for imaginative play as you recreate battles and adventures. The ability to connect the environments in various configurations enhances the overall play experience, providing endless possibilities for storytelling and creativity.As someone who appreciates quality construction in building toys, I was impressed with the durability and sturdiness of the pieces. The set is designed for ages 6 and up, and it strikes the perfect balance between simplicity for younger builders and complexity for those seeking a more challenging and rewarding build.Moreover, the Wonder Builders Pokémon Set fosters not only fine motor skills but also encourages imaginative play and strategic thinking. It's a fantastic way for children to develop problem-solving abilities while having a blast constructing their favorite Pokémon characters.In summary, the Wonder Builders Pokémon Set is a fantastic addition to any young builder's collection. It brilliantly combines the magic of Pokémon with the joy of creative building, making it an ideal gift for children aged 6 and above. Highly recommended for its quality, versatility, and the sheer fun it brings to the world of building toys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Pokémon Lego set!
reviews.reviewText: My kiddo absolutely loves these Pokémon Lego sets! This one is one of his favorites! The directions were easy to understand and were easy to use. The Lego pieces are vibrant and are crafted so perfectly that it was easy to place together. Definitely makes a great gift and is just the perfect size. Also, these Pokémon sets fit with the Lego brand which makes it worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Pokemon Set
reviews.reviewText: This a great basic set for anyone into Pokemon. The different sets all click together to create a giant Pokemon world if you collect multiple sets and even include extra pieces to do so. So if you decide to expand later this is a good set to start with and see if you like it. Some of the Pokemon themselves are difficult to put together so keep that in mind for younger children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good deal when on sale
reviews.reviewText: I got this pokemon mega bloks set on sale for $16 as a xmas present for my nephew. Hr loved it and enjoyed putting it together. I feel I got a really good deal seeing how a single pokemon sells at Target for $8.99.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Lego… but our kiddo loves them
reviews.reviewText: They aren’t quite Lego quality. The figurines were especially difficult to put together, and we ended up super gluing them after they continuously came apart. As you can see in the photo, though, they are very cute. Our son absolutely loves them and plays with them daily.(Note: They did come with the “scenery” pieces to build, too. I just don’t have a photo of that part to share at the moment.)

reviews.reviewText: It was a gift for a 9 year old boy and he loved it

reviews.reviewText: My son loves Pokemon and Lego so this was a great combination

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great !! - (Small Pieces warning)
reviews.reviewText: Wish I had taken a photo but it is exactly as shown on Amazon. I bought for my 6 year old cousin who loves puzzles and hands on activities. The pieces are small so could easily be lost or swallowed by smaller children*. My 6 year old cousin was able to assemble by himself.

My son LOVES Lego. Unfortunately name brand Lego doesn’t make Pokémon. However.. this exceeded my expectations! This set was perfect for my son. He had soo much fun putting it together AND it looks adorable on his desk. 10/10 from this momma!
Muy bien hecho , fue un regalo y le gusto mucho
Brinquedo lindo, igual aoa anunciado. Chegou direito e antes do prazo.
This is a Japanese made version. Easy to build and beautiful.

reviews.reviewTitle: 子供のクリスマスプレゼントに！
reviews.reviewText: 子供は喜んでました。初代ポケモンのセットで大満足です。やはりブロックですので、完成したら遊ぶというよりは飾るものですね！
